page.description: A list of hot spot properties with examples.

case.title: Always on Top
case.description: When checked the control is always on the top-most level of the form layout. No other form elements will over lap it.

case.title: Disable
case.description: Enables or disables the tabbed control.

case.title: Left
case.description: Sets the horizontal position of the control.

case.title: Top
case.description: Sets the vertical position of the control.

case.title: Width
case.description: Sets the width of the control.

case.title: Height
case.description: Sets the height of the control.

case.title: Anchor
case.description: Determines the way the tabbed control will or will not stretch as the base form is resized. Possible attachment points are: 1 = top and right 2 = top, left, and right 4 = bottom and left 5 = bottom and right 6 = bottom, left, and right 8 = top, bottom, and left 9 = top, bottom, and right 10 = top, bottom, left, and right
